overview: A professional boxer known as "Smiling Bill Flannigan" accidentally kills an opponent in the ring. He gives up the sport and heads west. He gets a job on a ranch as a cook, and before he knows it he finds himself involved in a war between ranchers and sheepherders.
tagline: See this great big, clean, vigorous story of the stirring day on the western border, crammed with gripping adventure, exciting chases and gun battles. Will keep you guessing every second.
title: The Burning Trail
